pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A GStreamer plugin for the JPEG format.
It includes the following elements:
* jpegdec - Decode images from JPEG format * jpegenc - Encode images in JPEG format
Elements found in 0.10 only (deprecated):
* smokedec - Decode video from Smoke format * smokeenc - Encode images into the Smoke format
See the installed README if interested what the Smoke codec is.
